name: John Hanacek
description: Founding Designer & Design Engineer building at the intersection of AI, spatial computing, and human-computer symbiosis. Designs and codes agentic systems, XR interfaces, and AI-augmented tools. Currently exploring MetaMedium concepts—dynamic knowledge systems that blur the line between tool and medium—and Earth Star, a self-improving research framework using OpenClaw.
award: R&D Innovation Award - Aerospace Medical Association (2022)

worksFor.name: JH Design LLC
worksFor.description: Design consulting practice specializing in AI-native products, agentic systems, XR prototyping, and founding designer engagements.

itemOffered.name: Founding Designer Services
itemOffered.description: End-to-end product design for early-stage startups and 0-to-1 products. Includes concept to production, design engineering with code, XR/spatial interface design, and design system architecture.

itemOffered.name: AI Coding & Agentic Systems
itemOffered.description: Multi-agent workflow design, LLM integration (function calling, tool use, RAG), prompt engineering, conversational UX, and AI-augmented development workflows.
itemOffered.audience: AI tool builders, LLM product teams, automation platforms

itemOffered.name: Robotics & Hardware Integration
itemOffered.description: Robot interface design, digital twin development, 3D scanning/photogrammetry pipelines, OpenClaw systems, and XR teleoperation interfaces.
itemOffered.audience: Robotics startups, research labs, hardware teams

itemOffered.name: MetaMedium & Emergent Tools
itemOffered.description: Dynamic knowledge system design, tool-medium hybrids, canvas-based interaction paradigms, semantic visualization, and experimental interface prototyping.
itemOffered.audience: Research labs, tool builders, knowledge systems teams

itemOffered.name: Technical Workshops & Consulting
itemOffered.description: XR design workshops, AI product strategy, design-engineering collaboration frameworks, rapid prototyping sprints, and speaking engagements.
itemOffered.audience: Product teams, design orgs, innovation labs

review.reviewBody: It was a tremendous pleasure and honor to work on the Nanome 2 Redesign with John. He's not only a true Visionary, but also an amazing listener with incredible intuition. I've never seen anyone able to so readily understand scientists, easily communicate with them, then design an experience they can scarcely imagine, but recognize as what they wanted (even Needed) as soon as they step into it.

John recently led a customer journey mapping workshop for my team, and it was an outstanding experience from start to finish. My team and I came away with a deeper understanding of our customers and a clear appreciation for the impact of product design from the very start of a project.

John's ability to stay ahead of rapid industry shifts is evident not only in his consulting work but also in his thought leadership. I highly recommend John for roles requiring design leadership, systems thinking, and future-focused innovation.
My choice for the most plausible vision of a future I desire goes to John Hanacek's scenario. I think I'd like to live there, and I think it is plausible in 100 years.
